sqlMap.select: select ifnull(max(VERSION),0) from SYS_ITEM_LOG sil where sil.ITEM_ID=#id#;
select * from SYS_ITEM_LOG sil where sil.ITEM_ID=#value# order by sil.VERSION desc;
sqlMap.insert:
insert into SYS_ITEM_LOG( ITEM_ID, NAME, DISPLAY_NAME, RESOURCE_STABLE, RESOURCE_CHANGEABLE, TYPE, SUB_TYPE, LEVEL, MODIFIED_DESC, W_ID, W_CHANGE_IN_TIME , W_MOVE_SPEED_OFFSET, W_CROSS_OFFSET, W_NORMAL_OFFSET , W_NORMAL_FACTOR , W_ONAIR_OFFSET , W_ONAIR_FACTOR , W_MOVE_OFFSET , W_MOVE_FACTOR , W_NORMAL_UP_BASE , W_NORMAL_LATERAL_BASE , W_NORMAL_UP_MODIFIER , W_NORMAL_LATERAL_MODIFIER , W_NORMAL_UP_MAX , W_NORMAL_LATERAL_MAX , W_NORMAL_DIR_CHANGE , W_MOVE_UP_BASE , W_MOVE_LATERAL_BASE , W_MOVE_UP_MODIFIER , W_MOVE_LATERAL_MODIFIER , W_MOVE_UP_MAX , W_MOVE_LATERAL_MAX , W_MOVE_DIR_CHANGE , W_ONAIR_UP_BASE , W_ONAIR_LATERAL_BASE , W_ONAIR_UP_MODIFIER , W_ONAIR_LATERAL_MODIFIER , W_ONAIR_UP_MAX, W_ONAIR_LATERAL_MAX , W_ONAIR_DIR_CHANGE , W_CROUCH_UP_BASE, W_CROUCH_LATERAL_BASE , W_CROUCH_UP_MODIFIER , W_CROUCH_LATERAL_MODIFIER , W_CROUCH_UP_MAX , W_CROUCH_LATERAL_MAX , W_CROUCH_DIR_CHANGE , W_UP_MODIFIER , W_SHOOT_BULLET_COUNT,W_SPREAD,W_FIRE_MAX_SPEED,W_FIRE_START_SPEED,W_FIRE_ACELERATION,W_FIRE_RESISTANCE, W_STAB_TIME , W_STAB_LIGHT_TIME , W_STAB_HURT , W_STAB_LIGHT_HURT, W_EXPLODE_TIME , W_READY_TIME , W_THROW_OUT_TIME , W_HURT_RANGE , W_HURT , C_ID, DESCRIPTION, I_BUFF_ID, I_ID, W_RANGE_START, W_RANGE_END, W_ACCURACY_TIME, W_ACCURACY_TIME_MODIFIER, W_MAX_ACCURACY, W_MIN_ACCURACY, W_CROSS_LENGTH_BASE, W_CROSS_LENGTH_FACTOR, W_CROSS_DISTANCE_BASE, W_CROSS_DISTANCE_FACTOR, W_X_OFFSET, W_SIGHT_NORMAL_OFFSET,W_SIGHT_ONAIR_OFFSET,W_SIGHT_MOVE_OFFSET, W_STAB_DISTANCE,W_STAB_LIGHT_DISTANCE,W_STAB_WIDTH,W_BACK_FACTOR, W_FLASH_RANGE_START,W_FLASH_RANGE_END,W_FLASH_BACK_FACTOR,W_TIME_MAX,W_TIME_FADE,W_TIME, I_VALUE, W_HIT_SPEED, W_HIT_ACCELERATION, W_HIT_DISTANCE, W_SIGHT_INFO, W_MAX_DISTANCE, W_ADD_BLOOD, W_AMMO_TYPE, W_FLY_SPEED, W_MAXALIVE_TIME, W_GRAVITY, W_LAST_HURT, W_LAST_TIME, W_SPECIAL_DISTANCE, W_SPECIAL_RANGE, W_SPECIAL_LASTTIME, W_SPECIAL_HURT, W_SPECIAL_LASTHURT, W_PARTICLEMUN, W_SHOW_SPEED, W_AMMOPART_KEY, W_CRIT_RATE,W_CRIT_AVAILABLE, CHARACTER_ID, W_DMG_MODIFY_TIMER_MIN,W_DMG_MODIFY_TIMER_MAX,W_DMG_MODIFY_MIN,W_DMG_MODIFY_MAX,W_CAPSULE_HEIGHT,W_CAPSULE_RADIUS, W_DAMAGE_MODIFER, GUN_PROPERTY1,GUN_PROPERTY2,GUN_PROPERTY3,GUN_PROPERTY4,GUN_PROPERTY5,GUN_PROPERTY6,GUN_PROPERTY7,IS_VIP,IS_NEW,IS_HOT, VERSION, CREATED_TIME,ITEMS,BACK_BOOST_PLUS,W_FIX_PRICE,`INDEX`, C_RESISTANCE_FIRE,C_RESISTANCE_BLAST,C_RESISTANCE_BULLET,C_RESISTANCE_KNIFE,C_BLOOD_ADD,IS_STRENGTHEN,M_TYPE,M_VALUE, IS_WEB,IS_POPULAR,RARE_LEVEL,FIGHT_NUM,IS_EXCHANGE,IS_ASSET ) values( #sysItem.id#, #sysItem.name#, #sysItem.displayName#, #sysItem.resourceStable#, #sysItem.resourceChangeable#, #sysItem.type#, #sysItem.subType#, #sysItem.level#, #sysItem.modifiedDesc#, #sysItem.wId#, #sysItem.cResistanceFire#,#sysItem.cResistanceBlast#,#sysItem.cResistanceBullet#,#sysItem.cResistanceKnife#,#sysItem.cBloodAdd#,#sysItem.isStrengthen#,#sysItem.mType#,#sysItem.mValue#, #sysItem.isWeb#,#sysItem.isPopular#,#sysItem.rareLevel#,#sysItem.fightNum#,#sysItem.isExchange#,#sysItem.isAsset# );
